pages.title: Description
pages.description:
Their inflatable tubes offer great protection when rafting ,berthing and a comfortable ride.
Although the tubes are made of very tough fabric, great care must be taken to avoid contact wth any sharp object or agressive surface such as sharp rocks, fishing hooks, knifes, etc.
